column3: Update I have 2012 Hyundai accent I was trying to connect led light to back of my trunk of my car. I think I touch the - and the + wire together by mistake I so I have no power to my car unless I put the key in and turn it then everything turns on. my car start everything like that drives fine but when I turn it off no...  show more   I have 2012 Hyundai accent I was trying to connect led light to back of my trunk of my car. I think I touch the - and the + wire together by mistake I so I have no power to my car unless I put the key in and turn it then everything turns on. my car start everything like that drives fine but when I turn it off no power locks dome lights nothing works.
